titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter, from the justices of the Kingdom of Ireland, to the Privy Council of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Cuningsbey, Thomas, fl. 1691.
Porter, Charles, Sir, d. 1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Letter dated: Dublin-Castle, 25th of July 1691. Signed: Your lordships most humble servants, Charles Porter. Tho: Cuningsbey.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
With: A particular and full account of the routing the whole Irish army at Aghrim upon Sunday the 12th of July 1691. With a list of the principal persons that were killed and taken prisoner.
